text: @NYGovCuomo Right, we must face facts. Here's a fact. You reported 10 new deaths, but multiple sources say more than that, and this says WAY more. Why do you suddenly have this huge spike? Did you hide this to make your numbers look better? Even JHU has you over 100. https://t.co/3fNTcf6y4T https://t.co/3eTEF3DhZP
